price: "Sai ku gaya masa magana mai laushi,* tsammãninsa yanã tunãwa kõ kuwa ya ji tsõro."
arabic: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا لَّيِّنٗا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوۡ يَخۡشَىٰ
footnotes: * Wannan shĩ ne dalilin umurni da alheri da hani daga sharri, kuma a yi haka da maganamai laushi ga wanda yake da iko da ƙarfi. Kõ dã ga wanda Allah Ya tsare da tsarinsa ne, balle ga wanda bai tãki kõme ba. Ta haka ne mai wa'azi ke cin nasara.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
